statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); ctx=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context.used_percent // 0' | awk '{printf "%.0f", $1}'); dir=$(echo "$cwd" | awk -F'/' '{n=NF; if(n<=2) print $0; else print $(n-1)"/"$n}'); [[ "$cwd" == "$HOME" ]] && dir="~" || [[ "$cwd" == "$HOME"/* ]] && dir="~/${dir}"; git_info=""; if git -c core.fileMode=false rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -c core.fileMode=false symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); dirty=""; git -c core.fileMode=false diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -c core.fileMode=false diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || dirty="*"; git_info=" git:($branch$dirty)"; fi; ctx_color="\033[33m"; [[ $ctx -gt 60 ]] && ctx_color="\033[31m"; printf "\033[32m\$\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m%s ${ctx_color}[%s%%]\033[0m" "$dir" "$git_info" "$ctx"
